name: Pinball M: Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball
storyline: Duke Nukem is here to shoot jackpots and chew bubblegum, and he’s all out of gum. Enjoy the biggest, grooviest, most badass pinball table ever made packed with guns and babes. Get ready to fight your way through hordes of monsters on Duke Nukem: Big Shot Pinball!
summary:
Hail to the King baby!

We couldn’t be more excited to reveal the next pinball table coming to Pinball M, the game that will haunt pinball players in their worst nightmares!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Pinball M: Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
